document.full_text: at both ends of libya's coast, rebels battled to disprove a claim by one of colonel qaddafi's sons that the last of the insurrection would be wiped out 'in 48 hours.'
document.title: rebels claim small gains against qaddafi forces
lines_and_colors: at both ends of libya's coast, rebels battled to disprove a claim by one of colonel qaddafi's sons that the last of the insurrection would be wiped out 'in 48 hours.'
